answers.answer: My apologies for the sig delay in responding to your post.  I did not see it for some reason.  To be brief1. This is a relatively low risk scan.  Most docs would treat medically2. There may be some coronary disease in the vessel the supplies the bottom part of the heart but its unlikely to be of great significance.3. Having said 1+2, depending on his symptoms and other features (exam, heart function, etc), the cardiologist might opt to approach things differently.Good luck.Dr. Rich
